summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons Health Services document for inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein, recording a medical observation of his right forearm on July 6, 2019, and a subsequent reading on July 9, 2019. It appears to be a standard inmate medical record, likely documenting a tuberculosis skin test (PPD) reading.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the medical record, identified as an inmate in Bureau of Prisons custody.

events.title: Medical Observation - Right Forearm
events.description: A medical observation or procedure was performed on Jeffrey Epstein's right forearm, documented at 21:39 and entered into the system at 21:43 EST.

events.title: PPD Test Reading
events.description: A reading of a PPD (tuberculosis skin test) for inmate Jeffrey Epstein was performed, showing 0 mm induration, indicating a negative result.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was in Bureau of Prisons custody as of July 6, 2019.
A medical procedure or observation was documented on Epstein's right forearm on July 6, 2019.
Epstein received a PPD (tuberculosis) skin test, which was read as negative (0 mm induration) on July 9, 2019.
The document is a standard health services record from the Bureau of Prisons.
The document date is shortly before Epstein's death in August 2019.
